intro.heading: Consultation Form
intro.subHeading1: This survey will help us get to know you better so we can provide you with useful consultation and tips on how to improve your online presence.
intro.subHeading2: For best result we suggest filling as many fields as possible so we have more information to work with.

step1.title: About You / Your Company
step1.subtitle: Please enter your contact and company information

companyDescription.label: What does your company do?
companyDescription.placeholder: Enter a brief description of your company

step2.title: Links
step2.description: We will review your existing website and/or social media channels and evaluate them based on our experience so we can tell you if and how you can improve them.

step3.title: Phase & Challenges
step3.description: Please select the phases and challenges relevant to your project

phase.label: What phase is your project in?
phase.description: Select one or more phases that best describe your current progress

options.1: Launching my online presence for the first time
options.2: I already have an online presence but want to improve/add to it
options.3: I want to optimize and maintain what I have

challenges.label: Which challenges do you want to address?
challenges.description: Select one or more statements that best describe your current marketing challenges

options.1: I have no or very little online presence
options.2: I don't have a strong brand identity (logo, colors, font, etc.)
options.3: The website doesn't work as desired
options.4: Social media channels are struggling to gain traction
options.7: Location is hard to find on Google Maps
options.8: Website does not appear at the top of Google search
options.9: I don't have enough time to manage my online presence
options.10: My content (photos, videos, texts) could be more professional

launchBudget.label: Launch Budget
launchBudget.description: Budget for launching your online presence, including web design and development, branding, content creation, and online advertising campaigns

runningBudget.label: Ongoing Budget
runningBudget.description: Ongoing payments for maintaining and/or improving your online presence, such as advertising, social media management, or search engine optimization (SEO)

step5.title: Additional Information
step5.description: Please provide any additional information that may help us understand your needs better

additionalInfo.label: Additional Information
additionalInfo.placeholder: Enter any additional information or comments

multiStepForm.submitError: Please correct the errors in the form before submitting.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

website.url: Please enter a valid website URL

instagram.url: Please enter a valid Instagram URL

facebook.url: Please enter a valid Facebook URL

tiktok.url: Please enter a valid TikTok URL

youtube.url: Please enter a valid YouTube URL

x.url: Please enter a valid X (Twitter) URL

phase.required: Please select at least one phase

challenges.required: Please select at least one challenge
